Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by Minnesota in 1983...
Earned first career win on 4/14/1985...
Had first career hit on 9/2/1985, off Robert Solis (PIT)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1986, winning 2 games with a 1.62 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1988, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
Injured on 5/17/1990 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Traded from Minnesota to Coney Island on 7/20/1990 (Going to CI: P J. Locher. Going to Min: P G. Westra, CF S. Atchley, 1B O. Benitez)...
